ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Combine multidimensional arrays into a single array. This is a generalization of 'cbind' and 'rbind'.  Works with vectors, matrices, and higher-dimensional arrays.  Also provides functions 'adrop', 'asub', and 'afill' for manipulating, extracting and replacing data in arrays.

Combine multidimensional arrays into a single array. This is a generalization of 'cbind' and 'rbind'.  Works with vectors, matrices, and higher-dimensional arrays.  Also provides functions 'adrop', 'asub', and 'afill' for manipulating, extracting and replacing data in arrays.

name: r-abind
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4-8" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-abind
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/abind_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/abind/abind_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 264a051b523ceae1795a0879e7768949ea55c586ac8db0adf1f5ebeddd2623e1

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('abind')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('abind')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=abind
  license: LGPL (>= 2)
  summary: Combine multidimensional arrays into a single array. This is a generalization of 'cbind' and 'rbind'.  Works with vectors, matrices, and higher-dimensional arrays.  Also provides functions 'adrop', 'asub', and 'afill' for manipulating, extracting and replacing data in arrays.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - qwhelan

# Package: abind
# Version: 1.4-5
# Date: 2016-06-19
# Title: Combine Multidimensional Arrays
# Author: Tony Plate <tplate@acm.org> and Richard Heiberger
# Maintainer: Tony Plate <tplate@acm.org>
# Description: Combine multidimensional arrays into a single array. This is a generalization of 'cbind' and 'rbind'.  Works with vectors, matrices, and higher-dimensional arrays.  Also provides functions 'adrop', 'asub', and 'afill' for manipulating, extracting and replacing data in arrays.
# Depends: R (>= 1.5.0)
# Imports: methods, utils
# License: LGPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-07-19 15:24:25 UTC; tap
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-07-21 19:18:05
